highlights: Implement monitoring framework in Go for Kubernetes node registration.
Reduce on-call resolution time by automatically identifying common problems during registration.
Deploy across production GKE nodes for use by all GKE customers.
Deployed Certificate Transparency Log monitors for Google Trust Services, Google Chrome, and other Google teams, ensuring up-to-date queryable transparency logs for millions of users.
Managed a database of billions of log entries, monitoring for new entries and ensuring timely detection of misissued certificates.
